title: Customer Service Representative Job at GreyStone Consulting Limited
content:
GreyStone Consulting Limited - Our client is a leading confectionary is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Service Representative

Job Location: Gbagada, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are looking for a friendly, organized, and service-oriented Customer Service Representative to join our team.
	You will be the face of the business, responsible for managing customer interactions, ensuring smooth service experiences, and helping maintain client satisfaction.


Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Customer Interaction: Greet walk-in customers and answer phone or WhatsApp inquiries with professionalism and courtesy
	Order Management: Receive, tag, and document incoming laundry orders accurately using POS or digital systems
	Payment Handling: Process payments (cash, card, transfers), issue receipts, and maintain accurate transaction records
	Follow-up: Call or message customers when orders are ready, delayed, or need clarification
	Complaint Handling: Address customer complaints or concerns politely and escalate unresolved issues to management
	Communication: Inform customers about delivery/pick-up times, delays, or any issues with their garments
	Customer Records: Maintain updated customer records and notes for personalized service
	Clean Environment: Keep the front desk and customer waiting area clean, tidy, and welcoming


Qualifications & Skills


	1 - 2 years of experience in a customer service, front desk, or receptionist role (service or retail experience is preferred)
	Excellent verbal and written communication skills
	Friendly, confident, and patient personality
	Basic computer literacy and familiarity with POS or order management software
	Strong attention to detail and organizational skills
	Problem-solving attitude and ability to stay calm under pressure
	Punctual, trustworthy, and presentable appearance
	Must be fluent in English; additional local language skills are a plus.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates can send their CV to: consultgreystone@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Internal Auditor Job at Eat 'N’ Go Limited
content:
Eat 'N’ Go Limited is a restaurant group on a mission to become the premier food operator in Africa. So far, our growing family consists of three international brands, Domino's Pizza, Cold Stone Creamery & Pinkberry.
Eat ‘N’ Go limited officially started operation in August 2012 with the premier store at 4, Saka Tinubu Victoria Island, Lagos. Today, Eat N' Go has about 100 stores (outlet) across Nigeria and still growing.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Internal Auditor
Job Location: Port Harcourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Contract
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Job Description
The following are some of the responsibilities of the Resident Auditor;


	Conduct daily stock audit and issuing variance report for the two brands.
	Regular (Sales) cash , Card spot checks.
	Regular petty cash spot checks including all expenses such as (Transportation , Maintenance expenses and any other ops related expenses)
	Store supply verification from commissary and any other direct supplies.
	Sales deposit (Cash and Card verification)
	Flexible schedule to audit the CSR’s during different day parts ( morning , Afternoon , evening and closing)
	Short-Banking validation and monitor items relating to LSM, free samples, proms, BOGOF, etc.
	Review and validation of Stock Variance Report of the Store
	Review all inter-stores transfers to ensure that all proper approvals and documentations are raised. etc.


Qualifications


	Bachelor’s Degree or its equivalent in business related course (Accounting, Audit, Finance, Statistics or Economics)
	2 years of experience in an Audit function; QSR (Quick Service Restaurant) experience would be an added advantage.
	ACA certification is an added advantage
	High Integrity, utmost confidentiality level
	Good analytical skill etc

title: Accountant Job at Techdroid Integrated Services
content:
Techdroid Integrated Services is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time 

Key Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Accurately record all financial transactions, including payments, expenses, invoices, and bank deposits, if any. 
	Prepare and analyze various financial reports, such as balance sheets,  income statements, profit and loss, and cash flow statements. 
	Reconcile accounts payable and receivable, bank accounts, and other financial accounts. 
	Contribute to the development of budgets and financial forecasts. 
	Ensure compliance with relevant accounting standards (e.g., GAAP), legal regulations, and internal policies 
	Prepare asset, liability, and capital account entries by compiling and analyzing account information
	Prepare and send sales invoices and proposals to customers 
	Analyze financial data to identify trends, potential risks, and areas for  improvement. 
	 Ensure the integrity and accuracy of all financial data and implement appropriate internal controls. 
	Participate in or conduct internal and external audits periodically. 
	Monitor accounts receivable and follow up with customers on outstanding balances
	Prepare and oversee budgeting, forecasting, and financial analysis reports to support informed decision-making by the Management
	Ensure submission of daily, weekly, monthly, yearly and every other  periodic reports
	Onboarding new client’s on software annual maintenance & renewals
	Update the vendor list and customer contacts.
	Stay updated with product prices and conduct market surveys periodically
	Responsible for the Management of stocks (e.gs Hardware, etc) and distribution
	Record all daily transactions and postings ( e.gs, imprest, petty cash expenses).
	Any other job as assigned by the Management.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 1 - 3 years of work experience.


Salary
N100,000 - N150,000 Monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@techdroidsystems.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Account Executive Job at Peridot Forte Solutions Consulting
content:
Peridot Forte Solutions Consulting was birthed out of the passion to assist and help organization to create a structure and frame work for their businesses thereby achieving high rate of organizational performance and profit. Organization strives achieving high rate of organizational performance and profit.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Account Executive

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full Time

Job Overview
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly motivated and detail-oriented Account Executive to join our team.
	The ideal candidate will have a strong foundation in accounting principles and be responsible for supporting daily financial operations, including preparing bank reconciliation statements, managing accounts payable/receivable, and maintaining financial records.


Key Responsibilities


	Prepare and analyze bank reconciliation statements on a regular basis to ensure accuracy and completeness of financial records.
	Process and track invoices, receipts, payments, and other financial transactions.
	Assist with accounts payable and receivable functions.
	Communicate with vendors, clients, and internal teams to resolve billing and payment issues.
	Maintain accurate and up-to-date financial records and documentation.
	Support month-end and year-end closing processes.
	Ensure compliance with company policies and relevant accounting regulations.
	Perform other accounting duties as assigned by the Finance Manager.


Qualifications & Requirements


	First Degree in Accounting, Economics, or a related field.
	2 years of relevant work experience.
	Strong understanding of basic accounting principles.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, Sage, or similar).
	Excellent attention to detail and organizational skills.
	Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
	Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
	Good communication and interpersonal skills.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should forward their CV to: peridotforte@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

title: Sales Caller (Outbound B2B Sales) Job at Raphael Group
content:
Raphael Group is a professional virtual assistant service that connects employers with skilled remote assistants. We offer a wide range of services to support individuals and businesses, including scheduling, email management, research, and more. We take the hassle out of finding and hiring qualified virtual assistants, allowing you to focus on growing your business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Sales Caller (Outbound B2B Sales)

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT) and Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time (Remote)

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a proven, results-driven Sales Caller to join our team. This role involves reaching out to businesses across various sectors to promote and close sales for our services.
	If you have a track record of delivering sales results through cold calling and relationship building, we want you on our team.


Job Responsibilities


	Calling a pre-existing list of businesses to pitch and sell our services
	Sourcing new leads online and through social media (LinkedIn, Instagram, directories, etc.)
	Following up with warm leads and engaging them professionally
	Creating and improving sales call scripts for better performance
	Logging all communications, follow-ups, and outcomes daily
	Reporting performance weekly and meeting KPIs.


Requirements


	B.Sc Degree
	Proven experience (3-5 years) in outbound B2B sales or telesales roles
	A clear and fluent English accent (Western or neutral preferred)
	Previous experience working with Western businesses or clients (US, UK, Canada, etc.)
	Strong communication and persuasion skills
	Experience building and following a sales script that converts
	The ability to work independently, manage leads, and stay organized
	A 1-minute voice note (VN) introducing yourself and explaining your experience is required.


Who We're Looking For:


	We're not just looking for any caller; we want a sales professional who knows how to turn leads into customers.
	You should be able to demonstrate your previous success in similar roles.


Salary
N200,000 Monthly.
